title: [ PIXEL 4 ] Re-link Google assistant to pixel usb-c earbuds
content:
This is for Pixel 4 .  I cant find a solution. 

When I first connected the usb earbuds , google assistant connected and was able to tell me the time and stuff. I thought it was annoying and turned it off. Now I want to go back and enable assistant for the pixel usbc earbuds and I no longer see an option. the earbuds are not even listed as a device. they work fine and get sound, I just cant fingure out how to re-enable the assistant. press and hold up button for time. how do i get that back. I tried disconnect and reconnect and got nothing.. idk anymore
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
